<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to block creation of new homepages for upgrading customers.

- Fix script to set the property value to TRUE for "com.glideapp.home.deprecate_homepages"
- If the property exists and is already set to TRUE do not do anything
- if the property record was customized do not change the value (sys_update_xml)
- if it does not exist, do not create it, is already considered as TRUE</description>
        <name>Deprecate homepage creation</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.log('START - Deprecate homepage creation');
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
gr.addQuery('name', 'com.glideapp.home.deprecate_homepages');
gr.addQuery('value', 'false');
gr.query();

if (gr.next()) {
    gs.log('com.glideapp.home.deprecate_homepages with value false is found.');
    var fileName = gr.getValue('sys_update_name');
    var grCustomerUpdate = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
    if (!grCustomerUpdate.get('name', fileName)) {
        gr.setValue('value', 'true');
        gr.update();
        gs.log('Updated com.glideapp.home.deprecate_homepages property to true.');
    }
}
gs.log('END - Deprecate homepage creation');]]></script>
